info.title: Bluefin Spot API
info.description: Schema for Bluefin spot trading APIs.

get.summary: Get exchange TVL, total volume, total fee and other statistics

200.description: Successful response, containing exchange stats across all pools

tvl.description: Total amount of assets (in USD) currently held across all pools.

totalFee.description: The total fee collected across all pools.

totalVolume.description: The total trading volume across all pools.

parameters.name: pools
parameters.description: A comma separated list of pool addresses to filter results on

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Use this to retrieve pools containing the specified token

200.description: Successful response, containing an array of pool information based on the specified filters.

address.description: Pool address on the SUI chain.

feeRate.description: The transaction fee rate charged by the pool, expressed as a decimal. For example, 0.0001 represents 0.01%.

tvl.description: Total amount of assets (in USD) currently held within a pool.

price.description: The price of tokenA in terms of tokenB.

tickSpacing.description: The minimum price interval at which liquidity can be added to the pool, influencing the granularity of the price range for concentrated liquidity.

amount.description: Amount of tokenB in the pool.

address.description: Token identifier on the SUI chain.

amount.description: Amount of tokenB in the pool.

address.description: Token identifier on the SUI chain.

volume.description: The total trading volume for the period.

fee.description: The total fee collected for the period.

total.description: The total Annual Percentage Rate (APR) for the period.

feeApr.description: The fee APR for the period.

rewardApr.description: An array of reward APR values for the period.

priceMin.description: The lowest recorded price of tokenA in terms of tokenB during the given period.

priceMax.description: The highest recorded price of tokenA in terms of tokenB during the given period.

volume.description: The total trading volume for the period.

fee.description: The total fee collected for the period.

total.description: The total Annual Percentage Rate (APR) for the period.

feeApr.description: The fee APR for the period.

rewardApr.description: An array of reward APR values for the period.

priceMin.description: The lowest recorded price of tokenA in terms of tokenB during the given period.

priceMax.description: The highest recorded price of tokenA in terms of tokenB during the given period.

volume.description: The total trading volume for the period.

fee.description: The total fee collected for the period.

total.description: The total Annual Percentage Rate (APR) for the period.

feeApr.description: The fee APR for the period.

rewardApr.description: An array of reward APR values for the period.

priceMin.description: The lowest recorded price of tokenA in terms of tokenB during the given period.

priceMax.description: The highest recorded price of tokenA in terms of tokenB during the given period.

totalApr.description: The total Annual Percentage Rate (APR), which combines fee APR and reward APR over the specified period.

rewards.description: Details of the rewards program for liquidity providers, including the reward tokens and the rate of distribution (reward per second).

address.description: Token identifier on the SUI chain.

endTime.description: End time for the rewards program.

parameters.name: pool
parameters.description: The pool address for which to retrieve transactions.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of transaction for which to retrieve transactions.

blockTime.description: The block time in UTC timezone.

volume.description: The volume of the transaction. Only applicable in swap

get.summary: Get Pool Line Data Ordered by Time Descending

parameters.name: pool
parameters.description: The pool address for which to retrieve stats line data.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The interval for which to retrieve stats line data.

200.description: Successful response with stats line data

volume.description: The volume for the line data.

tvl.description: The tvl for the line data.

totalApr.description: The apr for the line data.

startDate.description: The timestamp corresponding to the starting point of stats line data

endDate.description: The timestamp corresponding to the ending point of stats line data

parameters.name: pool
parameters.description: The pool address for which to retrieve ticks.

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: A comma separate listed to token addresses to filter results on

200.description: Successful response, containing an array of tokens information based on the specified filters.

address.description: Token identifier on the SUI chain.

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: A list of specific token addresses

200.description: Successful response, containing tokens with their oracle prices.

address.description: Token identifier on the SUI chain.

blockTime.description: The block time in UTC timezone.

volume.description: The volume of the transaction. Only applicable in swap
The volume for the line data.

tvl.description: The tvl for the line data.

totalApr.description: The apr for the line data.
